full_text:
CAPTIVE BALLOONS AND SIMILAR DEVICES.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 173,944, Eff. 6/18/01.)

	It shall be unlawful to permit a balloon or similar device which floats in the air and is restrained, attached or held in place by a cord, rope, cable or similar means, to float, ascend, rise or remain aloft at a vertical height of five feet or more above the surface of the ground measured to the highest point of the balloon or similar device.

5.catch_line: Hand-Bills, Signs – Public Places And Objects.

6.catch_line: Hand-Bills, Signs – Beach Or Tideland Of City – Exception.

7.catch_line: Hand-Bills – Name And Address Of Distributor.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

CAPTIVE BALLOONS AND SIMILAR DEVICES. (§ 28.11)

  CAPTIVE BALLOONS AND SIMILAR DEVICES.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 173,944, Eff. 6/18/01.)	It shall be unlawful to permit a
balloon or similar device which floats in the air and is restrained, attached or
held in place by a cord, rope, cable or similar means, to float, ascend, rise or
remain aloft at a vertical height of five feet or more above the surface of the
ground measured to the highest point of the balloon or similar device.
